thread.title: Ray Dmuchowski
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Ray Dmuchowski

author: Ray Dmuchowski
title: Ray Dmuchowski
text:
I was suppose to get my chair delivered on Monday because I needed to remove the old one.Salvation Army picked up my chair by 2pm
and I called Gardner White to see if they could deliver my chair that same day which would be 5 days earlier. They said no problem and I received it by 9pm.. Now I am sitting in a very comfortable new recliner typing this out. The delivery people were very curtious and respectful of my home. Thank you Gardner White for all you have done for me.
